    • Method Detail

      • readTextFile

        public static java.lang.String[] readTextFile(java.io.File file)
        Reads the specified text-file in a String array.
        Parameters:
        file - The text file to be read.
        Returns:
        The text file where each element in the array contains one line of the file.

      • readTextFileN

        public static java.lang.String readTextFileN(java.io.File file)
        Reads the specified text-file into a single String with Newline-Charackters at the end of each line.
        Parameters:
        file - The text file to be read.
        Returns:
        The text file where each element in the array contains one line of the file.

      • writeTextFile

        public static void writeTextFile(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String[] text)
        Writes the specified text-file to the specified location. It will create the file if it doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        path - Path where the text-file should be created. Note: Overwrites existing files!
        text - The text to write, every array entry is a new line.

      • writeTextFile

        public static int writeTextFile(java.io.File path,
                                java.lang.String[] text)
        Writes the specified text-file to the specified location. It will create the file if it doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        path - Path where the text-file should be created. Note: Overwrites existing files!
        text - The text to write, every array entry is a new line.
        Returns:
        The operations done:
        2: If the file already exist and is being overwritten
        3: If it needed to create the file and/or parent directorys
        -1: If it couldn't create the file and/or parent directorys
        -2: If it couldn't write text in the specified file

      • stream

        public static void stream(java.io.InputStream in,
                          java.io.OutputStream out)
        Strean the input stream to the output stream
        Parameters:
        in - The Source for the Stream
        out - The target for the stream

      • stream

        public static void stream(java.io.InputStream in,
                          java.io.OutputStream out,
                          int bufferSize)
        Strean the input stream to the output stream
        Parameters:
        in - The Source for the Stream
        out - The target for the stream
        bufferSize - The size for the buffer, that holds thw written bytes before the are written to the new output stream

      • getCharset

        public static java.nio.charset.Charset getCharset()
        Gets the charset used by the write method.
        Returns:
        Charset used by the read method, by default, UTF-8.
